title: looking for duo partner! idc what rank you are!
body:
I have 3 accounts, 1 silver 1 gold and 1 plat. Willing to duo with anyone that is cool, pref bronze players because I love to smurf! Only requirement is you have a mic and can talk! Reply with IGN in this thread, I most likely won't be using this account :D 

Ranked only!

replies.body: boy rainicorn B3 would really like to get out of bronze
Yo, add me. I'm trying to get back to Gold before the season ends. I moved from EuWest to the NA server and I dropped down to silver. I'm S2
S3, hopefully going for gold b4 end of season I'm down to join 8) might be a smurf also....
